network.name: No Internet (Wi-Fi Connected)
questions: Is the device getting a valid IP address (not 169.254.x.x)?
Can you reach the default gateway?
Do other devices on the same network work?
steps: Confirm link/Wi-Fi association and signal quality.
Validate DNS by testing direct IP vs hostname.
Check proxy/VPN settings and captive portal.

account.name: Login Fails / Account Locked
questions: What is the exact error message?
Is this happening on multiple devices/browsers?
Any recent password reset or MFA changes?
steps: Check for lockout and reset/clear if authorized.
Confirm MFA method and time sync on device.
Test in private window and alternate network if needed.
